org.wildfly.security.auth.provider.jdbc.mapper

Class RSAPrivateKeyMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wildfly.security.auth.provider.jdbc.mapper.RSAPrivateKeyMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ColumnMapper, KeyMapper

    public class RSAPrivateKeyMapper
extends Object
implements KeyMapper
    A KeyMapper that knows how to map columns to a RSA PrivateKey.
    Author:
    Pedro Igor

      • getCredentialSupport

        public CredentialSupport getCredentialSupport(ResultSet resultSet)
        Description copied from interface: KeyMapper

        Determine whether a given credential is definitely supported, possibly supported (for some identities), or definitely not supported based on the given ResultSet.

        In this case the support is defined based on the query result, usually related with a specific account.

        Specified by:
        getCredentialSupport in interface KeyMapper
        Parameters:
        resultSet - the result set
        Returns:
        the level of support for a credential based on the given result set

      • map

        Description copied from interface: ColumnMapper
        Maps the given ResultSet to some internal representation.
        Specified by:
        map in interface ColumnMapper
        Parameters:
        resultSet - the result set previously created based on a query
        Returns:
        the resulting object mapped from the given ResultSet
